Reviews.Title: “Excellent value”
Reviews.Author: Son N
Reviews.Content: Pros: great location, great ocean view from our rooms (got an upgrade with a small kitchen), nice swimming pool and hot tub, easy free parking, staff is friendly and helpful, very kid friendly, convenient to shops (Burger King, grocery). Cons: a bit dated and can use a new carpet or at least a brighter color but it's okay given most of the time you're on the beach or the pool. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: “a return visit”
Reviews.Author: Leah H
Reviews.Content: Love Tropical Seas. Great view from our room. Reasonable rates. New flat screen televisions. Great staff. Everyone from the front desk clerk Eddy to the housekeeping staff are very accommodating. Nothing is ever a problem. Rooms are very clean. I would highly recommend Tropical Seas.

Reviews.Title: “Thanks for the Memories!”
Reviews.Author: floridahbound
Reviews.Content: This year staying at Days Inn Tropical Seas we rented 3 rooms for our whole family. I just can't say enough about how much we love to stay here. With bringing my 2 sons and their families we rented a large passenger van and had a time finding a place to park. Front desk made sure we had a parking space each night which is such a relief after being out all evening. We stayed on the 5th floor and the housekeeping department was so friendly and helpful. Everyone that works there no matter how busy they are always greets you with a smile and a hello. Roger was excellent in helping us book our rooms and always Diane is one of our favorite people there. Keep up the good service and hopefully we will be doing a couple long weekends this year.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay!”
Reviews.Author: Carol S
Reviews.Content: We recently spent another week at this motel. Whenever we are in the Daytona Beach area (which is once or twice a year), we make this "our home away from home." The staff is efficient and friendly and we love the ocean front rooms. The pool is great, there is coffee in the lobby all the time, there are a couple of computers for public use, there are some rocking chairs in front where you can visit or drink your coffee, and everything seems to run smoothly.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful!!!”
Reviews.Author: Karen H
Reviews.Content: My husband & I went to Daytona for a 5 day getaway. The room was ocean front on the 4th floor, great balcony, king sized bed was extremely comfortable with 5 extra large pillows on it. There was a frig & micro wave included & a large tv in a super big entertainment center. Not that we watched much tv. The pool was great to dip in but most of the time was on the beach. The staff was friendly and helpful. Fresh towels were always available along with the coffee in the lobby.

Reviews.Title: “A hotel close to everything.”
Reviews.Author: lone_knight_watcher
Reviews.Content: My wife and I went here on a weekend get away.It was a nice room and very clean. The beds was very comfy. The workers were very frendly and helped when we needed it. The hotel is close to eveything at the beach. It was a good price fr the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Location, location, location”
Reviews.Author: CaptnSam
Reviews.Content: It's a good spot on the beach. At 89 per night ( AAA ) + tax = 100+ you'd like a donut in the morning. Good thing there's a BK across the street. Dirty carpet & lumpy bed but it's all about the location.

Reviews.Title: “AMAZING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Ana210
Reviews.Content: great room, great views, great staff, great ground, great beach. great place to spend a vacation or getaway...the bedroom is ocean front 2 beds with full kitchen... fast elevator. great 24 hour fresh coffee. free vac for clean the sand or your car. few shops and restaurant at waking distance..i mean..this hotel is at affordable rate for the area..i will come back........of course i will..............

Reviews.Title: “Surprising find”
Reviews.Author: Kathi D
Reviews.Content: Recently stayed at this hotel for an extended weekend. The staff was fantastic and very friendly and accomodating. The rooms were clean and well maintained. The pool area was comfortable, and I enjoyed being at the quiet end of the beach. The only negative was the couple in the room next to us liked to argue as well as watch tv loudly well into the early morning, however I chose not to mention it to the front desk. Overall, aside from Tropical Storm Debby which arrived that weekend as well, it was a very enjoyable stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay in the beach”
Reviews.Author: Suetwe
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for 2 nights. We had a great oceanfront view. The desk staff were very friendly. Coffee always was available when I wanted a cup. In the room was a small kitchen and coffee maker. I really liked the indoor parking. Great for a cool car in the Florida heat. We really enjoyed our stay. I would stay here again the next time visiting the beach. The only downside was not making up our room until later in the afternoon.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to go back”
Reviews.Author: LugoffBeachBum
Reviews.Content: My husband and I visited the Days Inn Tropical Seas the first week in May and I am sorry for posting this so late. It was absolutely fantastic. Stayed oceanfront on the second floor which is where the front desk is located. Could not have had any better front desk staff. After arriving and seeing our room, this being our first trip to Daytona Beach Shores we wanted to stay 3 nights instead of 2. The gentleman at the front desk went out of his way to make that happen. Hotel was very clean and well-kept. Even though we did not use the pool we noticed towels were provided. Plenty of parking. Free coffee all day. Beautiful and quiet section of the beach. And a putt-putt golf course just across the street which we enjoyed. No restaurant but plenty of places to eat nearby. Very reasonably priced. Already planning a return trip.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to stay there again next year!!”
Reviews.Author: Tara H
Reviews.Content: Great stay, and extremely nice and helpful staff!!! We checked in and the front desk clerk (Diane) gave us suggestions as to where to go eat that was different!! We loved the place!! She was there and spoke to us every time we walked through. The room was well cleaned each day! We had only one complaint while we stayed there, and that was that next year we didn't want to stay right next to the elevator.....we heard it all night! But even that didn't make it a bad stay!!!! I would recommend it to others in a heartbeat!!!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location”
Reviews.Author: Monica F
Reviews.Content: This is our second stay at this hotel, and we are already planning next summer's vacation. This hotel is perfectly located on the beach. The rooms with kitchens are perfect for longer stays. The property is well-kept, and is quiet. The hotel even provides pool toys and towels. There is a good range of guests' age, and they come from all over the country and everyone is very friendly. Diane at the front desk is always friendly and eager to give advice where to go for a good meal. I would definetely recommend this property. The rooms are reasonable priced, they are very clean. I hope everyone enjoys this hotel as much as my family and I do. Monica/Tampa, Florida

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value beachfront hotel”
Reviews.Author: sydaus3
Reviews.Content: You pay for what you get, but this hotel has that wow factor that exceeds the low star rating. We just booked this low cost hotel to sleep over during a long drive, but on arrival at our room, thought this would be a great hotel to have a beachside holiday if you're on a buget. The hotel is a medium highrise fronting the Atlantic Ocean. There is a large pool and spa between the building and the sand with security fencing separting the hotel from the public beach. There is a security gate and small stairway directly onto the sand from the hotel pool area. There are lounge deckchairs in the pool area. The hotel is showing its age but our room was very clean and the bed was comfortable. There are laundry facilities with a washing machine and dryer. Reception staff made you feel very welcome and gave you change for the laundry machines. Although breakfast wasn't provided, there are vending machines on site and shops and restaurants are close by. There is an individual exterior balcony accessed by your own door where you can gaze out over the beach or look down on the pool area. Daytona Beach Shores is in a very good location for Florida's many attractions and travel along the East Coast of the USA.

Reviews.Title: “Excellant Stay”
Reviews.Author: jhermes22
Reviews.Content: We just got back from staying a week at the Days Inn Tropical Seas and could not have been treated better. The front desk staff welcomes you with open arms when you first check in and is very helpful with any questions you might have about the area. Our room was spotless with a terrific view of the beach. The hotel is located on one of the nicest sections of the beach and is a great value. Every employee we had dealings with was very helpful and friendly. We can't wait to vacation there again!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay during tropical storm Debbie”
Reviews.Author: Denell R
Reviews.Content: We stayed four nights and had a wonderful time. We even seen a sea turtle lay eggs in front of the hotel. Hotel was very clean and everyone was wonderful there. Wonderful experience for the money. We would recommend this for anyone wanting a ocean front place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay in Daytona May 2012”
Reviews.Author: Charlotte G
Reviews.Content: We stayed twice in early May at the Days Inn Tropical Seas for a total of 11 nights. We thoroughly enjoyed the room, the service and the staff. The hotel is right on the ocean, with gorgeous views. It's an older place but very well maintained and extremely clean. The front desk staff went out of their way to be sure we were happy, calling up to the room shortly after we checked in to see if everything was okay. We had a kitchenette so we could even cook and eat in our room. When we asked for restaurant recommendations, they were excellent ones. And the housekeepers were very efficient and courteous. One housekeeper took great pride in arranging the towels like swans -- delightful! We will definitely stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed Our Time Here”
Reviews.Author: TNTraveler68
Reviews.Content: We stayed 2 nights here after a 5 night stay on the Walt Disney World property. It really did not disappoint. My one complaint, if I could do it over, would have been to have a room on one of the upper floors. We were given a room on the first floor and it turned out to be very noisy and a high traffic area. First floor had the laundry room, housekeeping and maintence offices, and the main entrance to and from the pool and beach area. Other than the noise of the first floor, we really did enjoy our time at the hotel. We were allowed to check in early and our room, although small, was clean and smelled fresh. We had a poolside room and a small patio area to sit out on. The pool isn't that big but it was clean and felt wonderful. The beach was not crowded at all and the beach itself was really clean. We had some wonderful views. Saw dolphins swimming out in the ocean both days we were there. I really liked the location of the hotel. It lists itself as being in an area called Daytona Shores which is several miles from the actual touristy boardwalk and strip areas of Daytona Beach. I had never been to this area before and we really lucked out on the hotel and its location. Front desk employees and housekeeping staff were very nice and helpful. It was a restful two days for us before we headed home to Tennessee.

Reviews.Title: “My fav place so far...”
Reviews.Author: Bobbyaisss
Reviews.Content: Days Inn is nice brand, i have to say. This one is good too--i dont know why the gov doesnt help daytona beach area motel to improve better--such a nice beach but most of the place not very good--but expensive too. As a international traveller, I have to say--this days inn is not that good, but good enough to be outstanding among other places on daytona beach. The price is attractive--that's why first time i stayed there. On the beach too. Pool and spa are nice, the balcony is clean--not like other place. The room is nice--especially after see the Ocean Sands motel--that was a dump. The microwave and fridge in Days inn is very unique and clean. clean bathroom, clean bed. I loved it. and the towel in bathroom--the maid fold them into swans...lol sooo sweet. It's a nice place to stay, I never stayed in oceanfront room tho. Too expensive for me, but the ocean view is good. Sometimes need to wait for elevator but at least it works good!!!! I like this place, if you want to stay somewhere near the beach, have nice clean room, and easy to park--Days Inn is a best choice. :)

Reviews.Title: “Ocean Front Property”
Reviews.Author: Barbiemb
Reviews.Content: First of all, the manager of this hotel is one of the nicest people I have ever met. His name is Roger and he is so kind. He is always concerned about his guest and wants them to have a nice, safe, and enjoyable stay at his hotel. I know all staff at the check in desk, as I have been here many times. They are all nice and are all willing to help you with whatever you may need. This is a very nice oceanfront hotel with reasonable rates. It is always clean. I always have an oceanfront room and it is always clean and smells fresh. This hotel has a nice oceanfront pool deck, with heated pool and hot tub. It is so calming and relaxing to just sit on the balcony and see and hear the ocean after I have had enough sun and water on the beach for the day. They also have an underground parking garage, which is a plus, keeping your car out of the sun and it is not extremely hot when you get in it to go some where. There is a Burger King right across the street, very convenient, if you need to walk over and grab something quick. The employees at this hotel are nice and friendly, they are always willing to help if you need something or just need information, they all work hard to provide a nice clean hotel for their guest. I commend the house keepers, they work really hard to provide a nice clean and comfortable room for their guest. Housekeepers have one or the dirtiest jobs there is, as some of the guest don't care what they leave behind as long as they don't have to clean it up. I always give the housekeepers a break. I just ask for towels, coffee, and etc..I tidy up before I go out to the beach each morning. I believe in helping others to make their day a little better. I recommend, Inlet Harbor Restaurant (crab cakes are awesome) and Charlie Horse Restaurant (all the crab legs you can eat). My Grand kids love it here also. I treat them to a mini beach vacation every year. I brought them here last year for 5 nights and they still talk about it. A big thanks to Roger for providing a nice, safe, enjoyable hotel for his guest. I recommend Roger for the best manager award. Thanks for all the nice stays and hope to be back soon.

Reviews.Title: “Very good value Beach Hotel”
Reviews.Author: InspLimo
Reviews.Content: I came across this place when I was just looking for a 1 night stay in the Daytona area. I was so impressed by the place I rebooked for 4 nights the following week. The hotel is situated right on the beach. There is a nice pool deck & hot tub area that directly overlooks the beach and ocean. The area was kept exceptionally clean and towels were provided for guests using the pool area as were clean and comfortable sun loungers. The rooms I had were both on the 2nd (entrance) floor, right by the reception area yet I was never disturbed by noise and I find it very handy to nip out and get a coffee from the area right next door where computers were available, as were chairs and a TV area. In the room I had there was a large TV fitted to the wall and a kitchenette with a large fridge/freezer, microwave, a cooker with hob & oven. We found the rooms were immaculately clean and nothing was too much trouble for the staff. When we found the shower was not working I spoke to reception and the problem was fixed in less than 3 minutes. The room also had a balcony overlooking the beach and pool area which led to some wonderful views of the sunrise. For $69 a night this place takes some beating.

Reviews.Title: “3 Girls from Ohio”
Reviews.Author: hdrk4lulu
Reviews.Content: Very fun , relaxing , "no worries" vacation ! Helpful and very friendly staff.Clean facilities around the clock. Will " Absolutely" return for another vacation !

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Old Hotel”
Reviews.Author: drivingthru1
Reviews.Content: I loved that the hotel was right on the beach and at a great spot too. The pool and deck were nice. The staff seemed friendly. The only thing to be aware of is that it is an older property and looks more run down than I had expected. It's still clean and everything worked (except the wi-fi) but expect holes in the blankets, cracked plaster on the ceiling, worn carpet, etc.

Reviews.Title: “Surprisingly Great!”
Reviews.Author: sounddude
Reviews.Content: I needed a room for a couple of days for I trip I was making and this property came up in my search for the spring dates at a very decent rate. So after looking at the pictures and deciding to take a chance I booked the room. I was pleasantly surprised to find that this property is so much more than I expected for a two star motel. The rooms are spacious and extremely clean. Each room has a private balcony to watch the sunrise from, which I did. I also ate supper out there too and sat at night prior to turning in. The amenities are many for this level of hotel. On the beach side they have a large tiled deck with lounge chairs and tables and chairs with umbrellas. The large, clean pool is next to the deck which overlooks the Atlantic Ocean. At the opposite end of the deck is a hot tub. I didn't make use of this. On the bottom floor is the deck and pool area access and that is where the vending is. Kind of a walk but it is all in one place. There's also some arcade games at the same spot. And while walking around I found a shuffle board court just waiting to be used. The motel has two parking areas, one topside and another underground which protects you from the always changing Florida weather. Also on the grounds is a small coin laundry with two washers and two dryers. The room I stayed in was a good sized, older style motel room, recently renovated and very clean and new looking. Mine came with two queen beds, a nice table and chairs, a new GE large mini-fridge, and a large Goldstar microwave. I did not peak into the large pine cabinet to check out the TV as I wasn't there to watch television, but to get quiet and read. The bathroom was on the small size but normal for older properties. It had a full tub, vibrating shower head, and a single sink. And the bathroom has a door for privacy. Understanding that it's not the Ritz, the Days Inn Tropical Seas is a very simple, clean, and comfortable room at a decent price. And it's only a few steps from Daytona's world famous drive-on beach and the Atlantic Ocean. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: “A little time to relax”
Reviews.Author: Doyle A
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 4 nights and had a much needed relaxing visit. Would recommend this establishment to anyone. Would recommend that you get the higher floors because of the fabulous view from the balconies. The staff were very friendly and was very accommodating.

Reviews.Title: “High the beter”
Reviews.Author: CRMCleveland_NY
Reviews.Content: Fifth year in a row staying here. Older but clean and value for your money. I would suggest upper floors. Some years we are lower and can hear the pool and parked vendors motors if our balcony door is open. Free Wifi included with room rates. I especially like inside safety of all rooms are inside entrances. Must pass thru the lobby to get to your room. A few times the elevator was a longer wait, but not too bad. The staff was wonderful. Check in was easy. Our flight was early I called the hotel and they had our room ready when we got there - which was about 1:30 p.m. (before check in time). Great hotel for relaxing and walking the beach. Nice to have refrigerator and mircowave in the room. If you need anything ask the front desk - they are very helpful. Note: Only shampoo and soap in the room but I called before we arrived to verify shampoo still in the room and she stated we now also offer conditioner. When I got to the room no conditioner. I asked at the front desk and they had it there and also lotion. This area of the ocean is not as crowded as some. I usually go during college break and have never had a problem with this time of year.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous for the price”
Reviews.Author: funtravelingwithme
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 2 nights in an ocean view room and for the price it just doesn't get any better than this. We booked through a third party and paid about $65 / night including taxes. The room was worth twice that. The ocean view room (south side of property) had a great view. There was a vacant lot next door so there was not another building right on top of you. Got to see a good stretch of beach as well as the pier - lovely (Ocean view was actually nicer than ocean front - took a peek at an unoccupied ocean front room. The Ocean front was a larger room with better layout but the view was not as good; you only got to see a slice of the ocean, not much else.) The room was a bit small and dated and it is an older hotel but again, for the money we have no complaints. They had two computers in the lobby which was a plus since I don't have a laptop. Most Days Inns include breakfast but not this one. Not a show stopper but just keep that in mind if you are expecting breakfast to be included. The beach of course was the main selling point here. Yes, cars do drive on it but that is true for most of Daytona. What I liked was there was a good stretch of sand that was above water level. In some parts of Daytona the water covers the whole beach, depending on the tide but not here. If you set yourself up about where the cars park you are good for the entire day. Also, beach was clean, no trash or seaweed. We will return. Our only dilemma is which room type to pick next time - ocean front efficiency with good layout or ocean view with great view.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience”
Reviews.Author: BeachBumNewbie
Reviews.Content: Definately would return to this hotel. We stayed two nights recently. The staff is very friendly. The room was very clean. The view was incredible. Environmentally conscious.

Reviews.Title: “EWWWW....”
Reviews.Author: tkmilam
Reviews.Content: My husband and I decided to got to Bike Week in Daytona Beach since it was the same week we were coming in from a cruise. We were a little late in making reservations and ended up staying at the Days Inn Tropical Seas, which we didn't know at the time but it is several miles from Main Street in Daytona Beach. When we arrived at the hotel, we opened the door to our room and were overcome with the overwhelming stench of some type of disinfectant or some kind of chemical. I immediately wanted to change rooms, but my husband is the type to not want to complain about anything, so we stayed. I opened the balcony door to let some fresh air in, but the smell was so strong it didn't help alot. Our room was beachfront and had a nice view or I probably would have given it a 1 star. In the bathroom floor, there was hair and nasty toenail clippings in the corners. Filthy. The handles for the water in the shower were practically coming out of the wall. I wouldn't mind going back to Bike Week sometime, but I would not stay at this hotel again, partially due to the location, but mostly because it was filthy dirty and stinky.

Reviews.Title: “Great Spot, couldnt ask for anything more.”
Reviews.Author: themyatts
Reviews.Content: We had a horrible travelling day, checked into the wrong hotel the night before, missed our connector flight, the list went on and on and on. One thing that didnt go wrong was the hotel. What a beautiful hotel, clean, updated, and the view was, there is no words to describe the view, absolutley breathtaking. What a trip, the staff was friendly, complimentary coffee in the morning in the lobby, this was everythign that we could of asked for and more. We will definently be staying here again, hopefully in the near future.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it so much...we stayed 3 extra nights!”
Reviews.Author: Christine D
Reviews.Content: Recently stayed at the Days Inn for our honeymoon. We were scheduled to be there 4 nights and then head over to the Gulf side for 3 nights. We were so happy with the location and price..we stayed at Days Inn for the whole week! Rooms were very clean..location was perfect...and we were very pleased with our ocean "view" room - we had a fabulous view of the ocean, as well as the inlet - without all the noise of the pool that the ocean "front" rooms had. We cannot wait to return!!

Reviews.Title: “billchris”
Reviews.Author: Bill1722
Reviews.Content: Very nice ,clean room . Staff was very friendly. Beautiful view at a reasonable rate.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Stay!!”
Reviews.Author: cdharmony
Reviews.Content: Just have to share what a truly great experience I recently had at this hotel. Every staff member we encountered including check-in, maintenance, cleaning really went above and beyond to make our stay the best possible experience. I forget the gentleman's name at check-in, but he was especially accommodating with me and my young children. Of course, you don't have the fancy amenities, but none were missed at all. The room was spotless w a beautiful view. The pool was wonderful and the beach was amazing. I would 100% return to this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice surprise!”
Reviews.Author: Vixenette
Reviews.Content: Seeking an inexpensive, but peaceful escape from family drama, my sister and I ended up at 'Days Inn Tropical Seas' on Daytona Beach, FL. No fancy amenities, but still a 5 star treatment hotel! We awkwardly arrived at the hotel, not knowing what to expect...but we were greeted by the most hospitable hostess, Diane, who immediately put anxieties to rest! She was very pleasant and welcoming...the rooms were very clean (Thank You Teena!)...which made our entire first Daytona Beach experience a very memorable experience! I would definitely return again! Thank You Diane and Teena!...People like you make traveling special!

Reviews.Title: “Finally a good and clean place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Chantal P
Reviews.Content: I have change of place once in Daytona. I was in an other hotel - I won't write the name here - it was dirty without daily services. 3 blocks away was the Days Inn. So quiet, clean and a good service from Eddy. All those things made a wonderful stay at this hotel. Thanks Eddy, you save ma vacation week. Chantal

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: curtihm
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have stayed at several places in Daytona Beach over the years. We normally like small hotels but this one is not too small and not too big. It is big enough that they are able to keep the right amount of staff working, to keep everything in clean working order. The staff is very friendly and courteous. They were always in a good mood and seem to work very well together. Not just the rooms but the building is very clean and well kept. The people that are staying there are mostly people that come back every year. We are retired and enjoy laying around the pool and walking the beach. The front desk was always very helpful when we had a typical tourist question. We felt very comfortable there and will make that our winter haven.

Reviews.Title: “A Surprising Jewel on the Coast”
Reviews.Author: Sea52Jay
Reviews.Content: Spur of the moment, inexpensive & in south Daytona away from the crowds. Nice sized room, private balcony, great view & sparkling clean. Eddie at the desk very helpful. Loved the "day room" facing the ocean with flat screen tv & 2 computers . Will definitely stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel for the price”
Reviews.Author: StevenDJ_11
Reviews.Content: Stayed one night, had an ocean view on the 5th floor. Friendly staff. Received permission to take some photos from a special location.

Reviews.Title: “incredible experience”
Reviews.Author: justin g
Reviews.Content: hotel room was very clean and was kept that way for our entire stay thanks to very proffesional cleaning staff .Roger , Eddie, and Racheal did everything above and beyond during our stay to make us feel at home and at ease. Would recomond this property highly, if you are looking for a place where the guests are treated like family. And hope to be back to see them all soon.

Reviews.Title: “Fleas in our bed!”
Reviews.Author: snowbirddreams
Reviews.Content: It was dirt cheap for beachfront and the staff was nice but the room was infested with fleas. There were fleas on our bed. There were clear nests all over the wall. The girl at the front desk did not seem surprised when we mentioned it in the morning.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: Linda T
Reviews.Content: Rodger gave us such wonderful treatment during our stay at this hotel. His smile and helpfulness was tremendous. This will be my only choice of hotel while in Florida. I also wanted to mention that if Days Inn would have travel mugs with their name, address and phone on it...guests will buy and use for their refills or even just for the ride home. Travel mug w/coffee would pay for itself and well as advertising and customer will use while going home to their destination A wonderful choice for a hotel for all.

Reviews.Title: “Florida trip”
Reviews.Author: Kathi P
Reviews.Content: I have previously booked many places in Florida. I have now book here three different times. The hotel is clean, the beach is awesome and the people are fantastic.Just the kind of place you would like to stay. Ask for Diane (great personality and people person). Suggestion to owners sell travel mugs with hotel name and still offer free coffee. Great for on the run. Take it from me we are always on the run.

Reviews.Title: “Back Again”
Reviews.Author: whitekrow
Reviews.Content: I was here in April and again in November for 10 days . Both times I was pleasantly surprised by the cleanliness of the hotel , pool and beach area , my beach side room with balcony ,. as well as the pleasant staff . I had a kitchenette both times and was able to make light meals . There are many places to get a meal within walking or short driving distance however and a bar across the street if you have to quench your thirst . I will probably staying here again this March / April 2012 .

Reviews.Title: “Great room with an incredible view.”
Reviews.Author: Jamie H
Reviews.Content: We were very pleased to have found this gem on the beach. Staff were helpful, very friendly and accomodating. Our beachfront room on the 6th floor had an amazing view. The kitchenette came in handy for an extended stay. The heated pool and deck were very well maintained. Most important to us...the lobby, our room, pool area, etc. were very clean.

Reviews.Title: “Great accommodations for the price and location...loved it!”
Reviews.Author: denisedreamzbig
Reviews.Content: We only stayed one night after leaving Ft Lauderdale but if I could do it all over again I would stay at this hotel more days and Ft Lauderdale less days. The hotel was clean, staff was professional yet friendly, and the patio deck was awesome! Great views, clean beaches, relaxing, easy to find and accessible. I will be back in March!

Reviews.Title: “Loved It!!!”
Reviews.Author: john m
Reviews.Content: For the money you can't go wrong. Great (beautiful) location, friendly/helpful staff, rooms are very nice,Family friendly! will be staying here again when I return next August. Loved It!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in Daytona Beach”
Reviews.Author: mnhky1
Reviews.Content: For our first trip to Daytona Beach, this was a highlight of the experience. Starting with Eddie at the front desk, everyone we interacted with at the hotel was extremely nice and helpful. Location was very convenient for us, since we had a beachfront wedding we were attending down the same street in Wilbur on the Sea. Views of the beach are tremendous and the location on the beach was very attractive. We felt we got a tremendous value at a great price and will definitely stay here when we come back.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, not your typical "budget" hotel”
Reviews.Author: mrpotty
Reviews.Content: My twin sister just got married in Daytona Beach, and I of course booked everything at the last minute. Many of the events were held a mile up the road at the "upscale" (for Daytona) Shores Resort, and I quite honestly didn't want to spend the kind of money they charge for rooms that are merely average. Nor did I want to deal with the hassle of taking 10 minutes to walk to my car that would have to be parked across the street and over a pedestrian bridge to avoid unnecessary parking/valet fees they impose even during Daytona's slow season. There are many choices in Daytona Beach, but I'm extremely happy that I chose the Days Inn Tropical Seas. Why? Well, it's got everything you really need for a beach hotel: -Direct Oceanfront Location -Large, clean pool and hot tub (tons of lounge chairs and tables with umbrellas) -Right across the street from a convenience store, Burger King, and a pretty good bagel/deli shop -Lots of free parking (I always found a spot in the front parking lot, but there is additional space in the parking garage). -One of the closest hotels to Dunlawton Blvd., which is the last bridge on the barrier island. This will get you to Interstate 95 in about 10 minutes (maybe 20 in the very worst traffic). -You're close to the nicer restaurants and relative tranquility of Ponce Inlet to the south, while you can be amongst the more trafficked and touristy Daytona Beach to the north too when you want that. -The rooms have all that you could really need. Some have kitchenettes, while almost (maybe all) the others will have a large mini-fridge and microwave, couch, table+chairs, closet + ironing board, etc. If you need things like a mini-bar, room service, concierge service, or spa treatments, you wouldn't even be reading this review right now. The only things I can think of as cons: -While there is coffee in the room off the lobby where the computers and a nice flat screen tv reside, there is no breakfast (free or otherwise) of any kind on the property. -On the food note, there is no on-site restaurant. That would be a nice convenience, but there are tons of other places to eat close by. -I could imagine the pool area can get loud during busy times, but that holds true anywhere and it was quiet during my stay. -The sliding doors to the balconies don't have screens, so you must make sure that birds and other wildlife don't get in the room when you want to enjoy the sound of the waves and feel the breeze :) -The wi-fi wouldn't connect on my BlackBerry. I didn't bother pursuing this because I didn't bring my laptop and didn't come here to sit on the internet. It probably would have been resolved if I asked the front desk, as they took care of me with everything else. The voice/data signal for Sprint was adequate. -Again, if you're seeking the amenities and frills found at higher-end hotels, you won't be looking here anyway. I haven't reviewed a property here on TripAdvisor in years, and I felt strongly enough about this place to share my positive experience with you. That right there says it all. To sum it all up, if you want a nice, clean and very reasonably priced oceanfront place to hang your hat during your stay in the Daytona area, then stop looking and book here at the Tropical Seas! If Eddy is working at the front desk, tell him that Will from Schenectady, NY sent you :) While nothing is perfect, you cannot go wrong here. You will have a great vacation AND have money to spend on the many other things to do in Florida.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay!”
Reviews.Author: Cecil D
Reviews.Content: I have spent one weekend here for the last three years and have just returned home from another great stay. Two years have been in ocean front rooms (they are really ocean front) and this last weekend was in an ocean view (not direct oceanfront but could still see the ocean from balcony). The rooms have always been clean and decent and the staff friendly and helpful. Great restaurants are very close by including "Aunt Catfishes". This section of beach is great and a little less crowded than closer to the Boardwalk and Pier. There is a nearby pier with a good restaruant and Lifeguard Station just down the beach. There is an underground garage for bad weather and extra parking. This is not a luxury resort with every new upgrade available but for the money it is hard to beat. Also the guests who stay there are for the most part friendly and just good average folks. A great buy if you are having to watch your budget. I plan to return again nexty year!

Reviews.Title: “great staff & well worth the $”
Reviews.Author: byrdchik
Reviews.Content: i have stayed at this hotel twice now and i will stay there again!! staff is wonderful and super helpful. the hotel itself seems to be an older hotel but has been kept up well. at first sight the lobby and hallways may appear dreary with the dark carpeting and lighting low (due to turtles breeding on the beach) but the rooms i have stayed in have been great. beds are comfortable. i get a room with a kitchenette, everything has always worked and been provided for me. there are plates, silverware, pots, pans, and even a toaster in the rooms. i have ran a housekeeping staff so i am kinda picky. i walk into a room and check it completely. pulled up the sheets, mattress pad, and bed skirt..both beds were clean no evidence of bed bugs at all!! i looked behind furniture to see how well the room had been cleaned, i was pleasently surprised. obviously the housekeeper on my floor knew what she was doing. when my son had an accident she was more than helpful and didnt give us the look (if u have had this happen to you, you know the one im talking about) the hotel is easy to find and within walking distance of a pier. i will definately stay here again on my next visit!!

Reviews.Title: “This hotel has it all!”
Reviews.Author: g8orgrrrl
Reviews.Content: We've stayed in Daytona Beach at various hotels every year for 31 years now, and this hotel has them all beat. It is unbelievable what an outstanding place this is, especially for the price! Squeaky clean, very comfy beds and pillows, gorgeous views and grounds, many amenities (in room microwave, fridge, coffee maker, hair dryer, and many specials such as fresh -- and I mean fresh -- coffee in the lobby at all times, beautiful pool and jacuzzi, a laundry room, underground garage with colorful murals, and a hose and vacuum to use on your car, even a couple of video games and a book shelf with shared books), and (very important to us) a price that is so affordable! For us, the best asset is the incredible staff. You get service with a smile and each member of the staff -- the management, desk personnel, maintenance, and housekeeping -- really makes you feel pampered. (Special thanks to Eddie, Lenora and Nicole -- you are awesome!) Here are a couple small examples of the outstanding customer service. Our in-room coffee maker stopped working (we make a LOT of coffee) and we let Eddie at the front desk know on our way down to the beach for a walk, by the time we got back (about 20 minutes later), there was a new coffee maker in our room! When I went to the laundry room to wash clothes, one washer was in use, and the other had been used and the previous user left a lot of sand in the bottom of the washer. I told the front desk clerk and was told it would be taken care of immediately. I came back to the laundry room ten minutes later and the washer was totally clean and ready for use. That is the kind of service you get at Days Inn Tropical Seas. And speaking of laundry, I was a quarter short and mentioned to one of the maintenance staff (I think his name was Steve) that I needed to go back to my room for a quarter and he said, "Wait just a minute!" Sure enough, he came back with a quarter for me so I didn't have to go back up to my room for it. These are just some small examples of why we love the Days Inn Tropical Seas so much. We were referred by my brother and sis-in-law who stayed there and highly recommended it, and we've been staying there for the last three years and will never stay at any other hotel in Daytona!

Reviews.Title: “Nice, friendly stay”
Reviews.Author: Lori C
Reviews.Content: We booked through Kayak and received the worst possible room ever- 1st floor facing jacuzzi and barely could see the beach. We told Diane and she was so helpful and gave us a side balcony room on the 6th facing south with ocean and intercoastal views (empty lot next door and then private condos). Very private. Told repeat customers get good rates. Staff very friendly and clean as it could be on the beach.

Reviews.Title: “STOP HERE!”
Reviews.Author: tami r
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a place to stay..STOP HERE! I"ve been going to Daytona Beach Shores since i was 8. Now 51. I chose to take a weekender getaway. How happily surprised I was! I wanted for nothing. The guests and staff instantly became my family. I chose to stay in and enjoy their company. The Hotel was clean. My room, spotless, with a great view. The pool was sparkling. My housekeeper, Leonora, was like a mom. There is no other place I will ever stay. Please come here and experience this for yourself. You will not be disappointed! I GUARANTEE IT

Reviews.Title: “Fine for a quick stay”
Reviews.Author: SA_Traveling_Texan
Reviews.Content: We stayed here one night as I was driving my son to college in Miami. Nothing fancy, but it worked for us. It is an older hotel and the room was a bit small, but it was functional and on the beach. We got a room with a partial ocean view, and it was beautiful from the balcony in the morning. The beach was clean and nice, and the pool was nice as well. We saved even more money by using a coupon in the magazine available free at rest stops in Florida. And the lady at the desk was very nice when we checked in. There is no restaurant. We ate at a nice little Italian restaurant around the corner.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful rooms, most oceanfront”
Reviews.Author: Richard1959
Reviews.Content: Looks like new remodeled rooms,my room had balcony, oceanfront,and small refrig/micro.very good rates, and has covered parking for cars. Clean room. Live 1 and 1/2 hr away, so plan on many weekend getaways here!,,

Reviews.Title: “Definitely recommend!”
Reviews.Author: Mrs E
Reviews.Content: Eddy, at the front desk, was most helpful. We found the hotel to be clean and the personnel were friendly. One small criticism...our room wasn't ready at 2:00 BUT I got coupons for the MOAS while waiting in the comfortable lobby area. I also used the computer and was able to keep occupied until the room was available. We will certainly return to this hotel in the future. It's location was perfect if you want all the benefits of the beach without too much traffic and congestion.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and will be back!”
Reviews.Author: skydalton
Reviews.Content: I always check with Trip Advisor before I stay anywhere. I am picky about the room and do not want a dirty room or bathroom and I definately hate bugs! I was soooo happy with this choice of hotel. My husband, myself and our two sons ages 5 and 6 stayed for one night. We wanted something directly on the beach with a pool. The room was very very clean and so was the bathroom. The water pressure in the shower was a nice suprise too! The beds were very comfortable. When we checked in the gentleman at the desk told us our room was ready even though it was before check in time. The room he gave us was on the first floor and I asked if he had anything on a higher floor. He happily gave us the top floor which was perfect! The elevator is slow but we were not in a big hurry. The restaurant does not have breakfast but did offer some sort of breakfast bars. The hotel is in a great location. The pool wasnt really big but it was ok and the hot tub was nice. It would be nice if this property offered a breakfast but Burger King is across the street or I noticed some of the rooms had a little kitchen area. Our room had a minifridge and microwave. We will definatley be back!

Reviews.Title: “we loved this place and will be back”
Reviews.Author: michele w
Reviews.Content: Fantastic place we had a sea view on a high floor ,room very clean and windows bed was a dream to sleep on .Fantastic staff they couldnt do enough for us ,they work as a very good team together .We left a daily tip for our maid she even wrote a thank you note that has never happened before.Front desk staff were very helpful as my husband and i are bikers we found some great bars with the help of staff.Manager went out of his way to talk to guests .Lovely homely hotel ,a great diner on the walkway pier great food also the bbq pulled pork up the road left handside great .will be coming back in nov 11 .

Reviews.Title: “RELAXING TIME AND WILL BE BACK.”
Reviews.Author: Kathi P
Reviews.Content: I booked for the first time in May and just stayed in August. We were to arrive on Sunday and decided to arrive on Saturday instead. When I called to add the day there was no problem. We enjoy how eady it is to get to the beach and enjoyed the pool. The staff at the hotel are always helpful and pleasant. My husband and I enjoy sitting out front and like that the staff will come out front and actually talk with you. They will help you find some of the local places you might miss. We requested a room next to the coffee and tea that is provided and had no problem getting this room. We will be returning later this year for another vacation. Our time there was very relazing and enjoyable. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant little gem”
Reviews.Author: Pip1128
Reviews.Content: On our way home from Orlando and we wanted to stop in Daytona Beach, just because it's Daytona Beach. Again, I used my phone to search Trip Advisor for a hotel. We decided to stay here and I will say that we were all pleasantly surprised. Check in was not until 3:00, but they let us park the car there and use all of their facilities until our room was ready. The room was clean. The bathroom was a good size and the furniture was modern. We had a beach front room on the 3rd floor. They didn't have a breakfast, but we wern't staying here for that. They just don't have the available space. They have coffee, hot tea, hot chocolate available at all times. We spent the day on the beach and only stayed one night. Daytona Beach did not impress us. Being from the east coast and within driving distance to all the beaches in NY, NJ, MD, DE & VA....the beach itself was nice, but there is nothing to do. They really don't have a boardwalk and what there is is not really much compared to what we have at home. The buildings one block off are all old and you can tell they were built in the 1940's. Anyway...we really recommend this hotel we had a pleasant stay and everyone was nice and the place is clean.

Reviews.Title: “On the ocean!!!...(dated hotel...NO breakfast)”
Reviews.Author: spurgeonlover
Reviews.Content: We booked this via hotels.com for what we thought was a good price. BUT you can save more by using one of the coupons from RoomSaver (we found this out once we got tto Daytona Beach, but it was too late to cancel our reservation without a penalty). Personally we think there are a lot of other better choices out there.....literally hundreds of places to stay!! We agree with some others that point out there is a bad smell in the hallways. Our room was nice and roomy and it was clean. Nice view of the ocean from our balcony, and it was great to just walk out the back onto the beach. We had assumed that the hotel offered a breakfast as almost all do nowdays. We were mistaken. They offer coffee and tea only. You can go across the busy street to a Burger King, but that is about it unless you get in your car to find a restaurant.

Reviews.Title: “Reasonably priced”
Reviews.Author: karoleigh
Reviews.Content: We stopped at this inn on the way to visit family. I had read the reviews of this website and decided that it would be a good place to stay at. Pros: located on the beach, hot tub, pool, clean rooms. Cons: bad odor in room. At first I thought it smelled like bug spray, but then I saw some people carpet cleaning, and there was that smell again! To the management: is there another type of carpet cleaner you can use that does not smell so bad? Overall, this was a good place for us to stay, even though there was no free breakfast. Parking and Wi Fi are free, though.

Reviews.Title: “Great room at a great price”
Reviews.Author: clw104
Reviews.Content: We found the hotel in a coupon book. It was a great price. The entire staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The room was spacious and clean. The pool was nice. We will definitely return.

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay that won't break the bank.”
Reviews.Author: mwilli36
Reviews.Content: Very very happy with our stay at this hotel! Clean rooms, nice beds and best of all is the view! Can't ask for better. Best value on the beach!

Reviews.Title: “3th time staying there”
Reviews.Author: lilatom5
Reviews.Content: This was our 3rd trip to Florida and we got lucky the first time and found the hotel that we will keep coming back to. The staff is friendly and funny, Diane was great! You couldn't go in or out without her making laugh and smile. You are right on the beach AND it is family friendly. (So is the beach right there) That is the biggest thing for us. The first 2 times we stayed right after spring break and didn't have all those thongs running around like at the boardwalk. I would recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Still satisfied!!”
Reviews.Author: susieq06
Reviews.Content: This was our fourth family vacation in Daytona and we have stayed at the Days Inn Tropical Seas each time and we will continue to do so. We love the staff and motel is clean and the maid service was excellent. Everyone is friendly and the groundskeeper work nonstop to make sure the surroundings are acceptable. We love it there and look forward to our next trip to stay there!!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic, we'll be back soon”
Reviews.Author: Careysfarm
Reviews.Content: We stayed June 9-15, in room 610. It was fantastic. The view at 4:30 in the morning of the sunrise is breath-taking. The room service was absolutely great, our housekeeping person was great., Anything extra we asked for she made sure we had it. Eddie at the front desk is a jewel, Days Inn should give him a raise just to keep him. He suggested great restaurants and sites in the area. We walked to Sun Glow Pier every morning for a great breakfast at reasonable prices. The pool and hot tub were clean and fun. There were not a lot of children or disturbing guests while we were there. This hotel is at the south end of the beach out of the busy traffic area. For the price you will not find anything at Daytona Beach to compare. It is an older hotel true, but older is sometimes much better. Thanks to all at the hotel for the great time.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible experience!”
Reviews.Author: hopeulikeit
Reviews.Content: We received a room on the 3rd floor and when you got off the elevator the smell of mold covered up by air freshener was overwhelming. This is obviously an older hotel that they have attempted to fix up without doing a full renovation. When we got into the room the screws on the bathroom door were sticking out and the door could not be closed. We pushed the screws back in so we could close the door and then my 11 year old daughter got stuck in the bathroom! When my husband tried to turn the door knob to get her out the handle fell off!! It was obvious that this was an ongoing problem as the door was all scratched up where the screws were sticking out. We requested another room and in that room the toilet didn't work at all! We left the hotel around midnight and got a room down the street at the Holiday Inn Express. It was new, clean and included breakfast...well worth the extra $20 a night. The only positive thing that I can say about the Days Inn Tropical Seas is that they did give us a full refund.

Reviews.Title: “All you need for a long weekend in Daytona Beach”
Reviews.Author: sofiyad
Reviews.Content: Clean room, nice staff, and free parking right at the beach. Not much more to say for this hotel. it is exactly what you need if you are planing to spend your time at the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Allways -consistent”
Reviews.Author: stairtool1
Reviews.Content: have been staying at this hotel since it opened in the 80's. It has always been our first stop when arriving in fl. Love the location on this quieter end of daytona. Close to many great restaurants, fishing pier, shops & grocery stores. The hotel itself has been very clean consistantly from year to year. large oceanfront rooms. hotel staff-very friendly &always willing to do want they can to make your stay enjoyable. looking forward to my next stay in oct. sincerely-R.B.

Reviews.Title: “Will Stay There Again”
Reviews.Author: KCC_003
Reviews.Content: I reserved an ocean front room with a king bed, microwave & refrigerator and stayed for a week. The room was clean and comfortable. At first I wasconcerned that I was on the second floor over the hot tub and it would be loud but it wasn't bad. The hotel doesn't light the pool area at night because of sea turtle nesting and that has the added benefit of discouraging late night swimmers and hot tubbers. It's an easy .5 mile walk down the beach to Crabby Joes restaurant on the pier for breakfast. Hotel is very close to the Dunlawton bridge over to the mainland. I recommend the Our Deck restaurant under the bridge. There is a grocery close by. Hotel also has a parkinggarage to keep your car from baking in the sun. The staff from the front desk to the maid service were friendly and helpful. Casual, clean and relaxing. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Beach bum kind of life!”
Reviews.Author: Whitneyd
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here for our one year anniversary vaca. Was hesitant at first but definately warmed up to the place! Upon arrival our room was not quite ready so they upgraded us to a nicer room that was ready! Beach area was not overly populated and we throughly enjoyed our visit! Would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “I CAN'T WAIT TO GO BACK”
Reviews.Author: Naerose
Reviews.Content: Days Inn Tropical Seas was the perfect hotel.. Even though there was rug removal goin on everywhere, we had the best view...... We would go back there in a minute. The rooms were very clean, pool was clean, and the ocean was right there.... You can't go wrong, Has a computer in the lobby to print out Plane tickets... Can't say was an awesome time we had there.. Thank you to all the staff... You really deserve a pat on the back

Reviews.Title: “we loved it so much that we will be coming back in august this year.”
Reviews.Author: oldman1943
Reviews.Content: good service,clean rooms friendly staff:right on the ocean far better than atlantic city.we stayed a week that was way to short i think but my sister had to leave.many 7 elevens there love there coffee,crispy creme donut bakery not far away.win dixie rt down the road,miss those stores.publix grocery stores as well.the board walk was awesome live band on saturday night,fireworks on the pier just can,t beat that.like the heated pool.port orange across the bridge may be moving there soon.the only problem i had while in fl was not at the hotel,but at walmart in port orange.

Reviews.Title: “Nice beach front hotel”
Reviews.Author: yarijavi
Reviews.Content: i been goin to this hotel 3 weeks in a role and is wonderful. We allways ask for a high floor with balcony. The pool is nice and heated, the beach is good abd there are good places around to buy food or stuff like publix, cvs, burguer king etc etc

Reviews.Title: “get Tampa Get away”
Reviews.Author: tinkswinkie
Reviews.Content: we were over there the first part of May for a family wedding. The Bride's mother had blocked a group of rooms for the out of town guest. We couldn't have been more pleased with this hotel. It was easy to get to from the interstate from Tampa. It was very clean and the rooms were great. As for the Staff. Ed the day shift desk clerk went above his duty for me. I got up check out day with a migraine. even though the hotel was booked that night he made arrangements for us to check out at 2pm instead of 11am, so I could get rid of my headache. The night desk clerk was just as helpful and friends. She made a point to ask how the wedding was. As for the beach and the pool they were both great and easy to get too. If I had to say any thing bad it would be the only ice machine and vending machines were down on the ground floor. We were on the 6th floor. except for that what a great place just to get away from it all. We will be going back for weekend get aways for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing!”
Reviews.Author: RealDealColeyfield
Reviews.Content: Absolutely 1 of my best days in florida. Front desk clerk was amazing. Right on the beach. Less than 5 miles away from everything awesome!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location. Right on the beach”
Reviews.Author: Evets901
Reviews.Content: We stayed here after Spring break was over. This is what we were looking for. It was quiet, comfortable and reasonably priced. Our room was an efficiency on the top floor overlooking the ocean. The bathroom was a bit small but the room was plenty large enough for us. From the pool deck on the second floor you could walk out onto the beach. The staff was very friendly and helpfull. We found several resturants that we enjoyed. Crabby Joe's which you can walk to. It sits on a pier. Our Deck Down Under, Jerry's and the Oyster Pub. The later is downtown Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “A great hotel with excellent facilities and a friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: joyful_1_11
Reviews.Content: We truly enjoyed our stay. Everyone on the staff was friendly and helpful from the desk clerks to the maids. The lobby had free coffee and tea 24 hours a day. There were two computers and some board games for public use. The swimming pool was great and there were lots of lounges and chairs for sunning. This hotel is right on the ocean so everyone enjoys the beach. It is a good value for the money. It is very close to the bridge to cross over into Port Orange. Many of the hotels in Daytona Beach Shores are run down. This one was not. Also, there was no musty/moldy smell which you find in some hotels.

Reviews.Title: “Great rates right on the beach”
Reviews.Author: Walker2011-04
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Days Inn Tropical Seas for a week and had a very relaxed time. You will find the staff very helpful and friendly from the manager to the maintenance people. It felt like you were a member of their family. Initially I booked a room for a couple of days and after I decided to stay longer I would have had to move to another room(s) but the front desk worked hard to keep me in the room which saved me from packing and moving. Thanks. The location is, in my opinion, very good. You are in walking distance to a couple of restaurants and some shopping. This was a very good experience for me. I'll be back.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: kkarbon918
Reviews.Content: We had a great experience at this hotel. We booked the hotel based only on price and a few online pictures. The pictures do glorify the property a bit, so when we first arrived I was a bit disappointed. However, our experiences during the stay quickly changed my mind, and I would definitely book another stay here. We ended up arriving a day early, due to a change in driving plans. We called about 6pm and told them we wanted to add a night to the room we reserved. Rachel told us that our room was booked for the night, but we were given a free upgrade to an oceanfront room for the entire stay, no extra charge. When we arrived in the room we were not pleased with the smell, it smelled like stale cigarettes. We didn't complain however, because of the upgraded view. After spraying the room with perfume and leaving the balcony door open for a bit, the smell went right away. The location is great if you simply plan on staying at the beach all day. If you want to walk to the main pier, it's about a 5 mile walk and not really worth it. The pool and hot tub were both clean and never too crowded. Beware though, that during this time of the year the whole beachfront turns the lights off due to the endangered turtle's mating season. The staff were all excellent. They answered all of our questions about directions and attractions. We even lost a beach blanket one night and the grounds crew held onto it until we called looking for it, then they delivered it to our room for us. The only thing I can think of for them to improve on would be to add a continental breakfast. For those who simply want to spend time on the beach, finding breakfast generally means going to IHOP or the Burger King across the street.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place With A View”
Reviews.Author: Pjavellana
Reviews.Content: I originally booked the street view room but I decided to ask if they could give me an upgrade since I had surgery and I would be spending a few days there while my husband went fishing at the Sunglow Pier which was right up the street. We usually book at Beach Quarters, but this hotel offered a better deal. They upgraded us to an ocean front and like always with every hotel on the beach, the view was fabulous! The room was big and clean. The front desk, I believe her name is Rachel was very helpful and had a great personality. When checking out, Eddy was just as great. Every time but once, when I went or came into the hotel, I was greeted by someone. It had a pool and a hot tub but I used neither so I cannot comment on them. The hotel was under renovations on their carpet. We were on the 3rd floor and sometimes we could hear pounding but it really wasn't bothersome. BTW, I was told the 3rd floor was completely non-smoking, and the 6th floor was half and half. We were almost right across from the elevator and I read about people complaining, but I really didn't hear or maybe I didn't pay attention to any elevator noise. There is a Burger King right across the street and the main pier is some miles up to the north but the Sunglow Pier which you can see down the beach from the hotel, has a restaurant with some awesome food and fishing. it cost to go out on the pier to fish, I believe it is $7.00 plus tax for all day and if you want to walk to the end of the pier, it is a $1.00. Just down the road under the bridge, is some good places to eat and a nice fishing dock. Port Orange is just across the bridge with shopping and restaurants; I would say within a 5 mile radius of the hotel. The hotel does have underground parking, but we just used the front lot which was great, so I can't comment on the parking garage. I also read somewhere on the reviews either here or other places about this area not being safe. I have been to this area over the last 1 1/2 years and never felt 'unsafe.' I have no clue what those people are talking about because to me, I do see this as a great area. CONS: AC can be a little noisy, but I found it refreshing just to open the doors of the balcony and let the fresh air in. Overall, a nice place to spend a few days in this area. If you are a tourist, then this may not be the place for you since the main street pier and shopping is, I would say about 5 miles down the road. This area is just a quiet place to spend a lovely day at the beach and enjoy some peace and quiet with the family.

Reviews.Title: “i will keep coming back to this hotel because of location and service”
Reviews.Author: ldlovey
Reviews.Content: the rooms were clean and the staff was wonderful anything you need they had it for you the cleaning staff was awesome and friendly staff and my room was very clean and the location of the hotel was right on the beach love it will totally be back and will totally book this hotel day inn tropical suites everytime i go to daytona beach florida

Reviews.Title: “best value in daytona beach in my 37 yrs of vacations”
Reviews.Author: thecatoo2
Reviews.Content: enjoy this place every year. staff is very efficient and cordial. special mention to the cleaning ladies staff and bob and the maintenace men. place is really clean and well kept up. front desk help is very friendly,special mention to Eddie and Rachel for their extra help. would recommend this place to everyone. next year my group will have 14 rooms. last but certainly not least is special mention to the manager Roger. he always checks with us when we are there to make sure that every thing is alright.. case in point, we had a, family emergency this year and onefamily had to cancel at the very last minute. Roger assured us due to our past history,we would serve no penalty. that is just good business if you can do it. THANK YOU THOMAS E LEHMAN

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to go back”
Reviews.Author: Little_Atlas
Reviews.Content: We really liked this hotel. There was an atmosphere of comfort everywhere from the front lobby to our room. It really made us feel at home. This not a swanky luxury hotel, but its cozy feeling is amazing. Every staff member was friendly. Everything was kept clean. Pride in their hotel is evident. We can't wait to return! When I was checking out the lady at the front desk told me some children cry when they are leaving. I believe it! It was sad to leave such a wonderful place.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible experenice”
Reviews.Author: rachlee1393
Reviews.Content: I booked this for the weekend for myself and 2 daughters who had a cheer competition over the weekend. We were first told that the hotel was 5 BLOCKS from the Ocean Center and it was actually 5 MILES! Which was not what I wanted at all. Also I was told that we would have a ocean view and we got a hotel next to us view.. no ocean view at all! We ouldn't even leave the curtains open because peoplefrom the other hotel kept looking in at your hotel room and it gave us the creeps. Then both nights we heard the people across from us having sex so loud that I thought they were making a porno. You could hear them all down the hallway outside the room and in our room. Try explaining that to a 14 yr old. Not fun! We got woken up 3 times throughout the night both nights because all we heard was a headboard hitting the wall and screaming not so nice things. On Sunday it took us over 2 hours just to get out of the hotel because the hotel was full of kids in a high school band and they were using the elevator to play on. Also the pool was packed Saturday night and Sunday morning because so many kids were in the pool. We couldn't even get in at all. Spent over $200.00 for the weekend and in all honesty it was horrible. Also the room was VERY small. The pillows weren't even regular size pillows, they were travel size pillows. Oh, and I forgot my room key in the room on Saturday andthe guy at the front desk asked me what room I was in and I told him and he just gave me a new key. No questions asked. No id shown, nothing! Pretty scarey. And no he hadn't seen me there or anything before that time. Not very safe.

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel we have ever stayed in!”
Reviews.Author: trishbell
Reviews.Content: Our whole floor smelled awful when the elevator doors opened. The room smelled like stale cigarette smoke...including our linens. When asked to change them out, the staff politely agreed but it was not done until after 5pm. So much for an afternoon nap before dinner. We were obviously misunderstood when asked for non smoking. The staff was friendly. The pool area was nice. It's a good thing because we were unable to spend any time in the room. Febreze was a life saver! We will never stay there again. Not cheap and not enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: “The two best nights of our Florida vacation!”
Reviews.Author: Jandy33
Reviews.Content: We had never been to Daytona Beach before, so knew nothing about hotels. We were aware of the Days Inn name from other trips, so decided to check this one out. It was wonderful! Everyone was so courteous and helpful upon checking in. Then when we got to our room on the sixth floor, we were just blown away!! We spent a lot of time on our oceanfront deck enjoying the views and sunshine. Then when we wanted to head out on the beach, it was just an elevator ride away. The hotel was spotless, quiet, friendly, the room we had was spacious, and we could go on and on!! We enjoyed walking to various amenities close by, and even though we were there during Spring Break, it was very family oriented and were impressed with that. A very, very nice hotel--we're going back next year!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Our "GO TO" Hotel on Daytona Beach”
Reviews.Author: Eruption
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have stayed here 2 times a year for the last 4 to 5 years. We get a room with a balcony every time we stay here and the sun rises are amazing! The staff are friendly and very helpful. There is no continental breakfast of gym so if that is the kind of things you look for in a hotel this is not the place for you. The pool and pool area are very nice and there is a 4 person hot tub which is very nice to sit in at night. The rooms are clean and some have kitchenettes which we sometimes get. I like the fact that it has a parking garage so your car does not have to be in the salt air. There are several restaurants and a liquor store with in walking distance. All in all I highly recommend this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: jcp75211
Reviews.Content: The location is excellent. The hotel is the best that 1985 had to offer, but it is a well maintained 1985. The room was outdated but clean. There was a fridge, microwave and stove. The TV was crappy, but the hotel is on the beach so TV is not a big priority. The internet was faster then many business hotels. I paid a lot (it is race week) but the average rate is very good and a great value.

Reviews.Title: “the place smells”
Reviews.Author: wmchsm1
Reviews.Content: a nice place but the whole places smelled of cigarette smoke. you cant escape it. its in the halls, elevator and every room. even non smoking ones.the clothes i didnt were and the luggage reaked of it. the staff was nice and polite. liked the under ground garrage. but if you are a non-smoker DON'T STAY HERE! you won't be happy

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Surprised,, very satisfied”
Reviews.Author: kpduty55
Reviews.Content: We went to Daytona on a whim, took bike on trailer to ride, was looking for place for end of bike week in March, anyway, drove around, stopped at this Days Inn, asked for rates, AAA discount,, got to look at room, saw heated pool and hottub,impressed that they worked, nice patio, ocean view, little kitchenette, very nice for price, so took for 1 nite, and rebooked for 2 nites on bike weekend, rates are higher, but was impressed, and cant wait to go back. Shout out to Rachel at the front desk, she was awesome.... gave us hook up for trailer parking at bike week,, name and rates where we could park trailer

Reviews.Title: “They didn't warn me about construction”
Reviews.Author: Jessica022
Reviews.Content: I started my vacation at the Days Inn, but because they scheduled construction - non-stop jack-hammering - I chose to relocate on my third day. For all you hotel managers, there is no benefit to not telling guests about construction. I ended up changing hotels anyway and now I'm writing about it online. Still, the hotel was clean, cheap and had amazing ocean views.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel in a great location.”
Reviews.Author: Shuttleviewer
Reviews.Content: Hotel is on the beach at the south end of the strip at Daytona Beach. The hotel is only seven stories tall and most of the rooms directly face the ocean with private balconies. Kitchenettes are available if you want to do your own cooking. There is no restaurant located at the hotel, although coffee is available all day long and your key card is good for discounts at local restaurants. We ate at Crabby Joe's and highly recommend it. There are large underground and surface parking lots. Both are free. The view is magnificent. We saw dolphins from our balcony. Daytona is about 45 minutes from the Kennedy Space Center and a little more than an hour from Disney World and Universal Studios in Orlando and is a quite, beautiful place to come home to.

Reviews.Title: “Great location & service for the money.”
Reviews.Author: RetiredTeach2010
Reviews.Content: Price was great for room with balcony overlooking ocean. Walk to beach out back door! Heated pool/hot tub, access to computer, lawnchairs/towels available. Friendly, clean, fast elevator, even though noisy. Perfect location! Only 45 min. to Titusville (Went to see Launch, which was unfortunately scrubbed)

Reviews.Title: “My Favorite Hotel of Daytona Beach.”
Reviews.Author: coopermays
Reviews.Content: Having stayed here many times over the past twenty years, I am always pleased not only with the service and quality of the facility, but it is always Fresh - constantly keeping the hotel like new. I like the underground parking. Florida does get rain and there is no problem getting in & out of weather. No exterior entrances to the rooms, also aids security. There is always fresh coffee and friendly people in the lobby. Rooms are clean and very well equipped. The beach is incredible, huge, sandy and clean. It is still my favorite hotel of Daytona Beach.

Reviews.Title: “Great place, nice stay”
Reviews.Author: FRENCHBADGER
Reviews.Content: We spent only one night but loved it. Very good hotel. We had an oceanfront room on the third floor. The room was large and clean. It was a king size bed and the room is equipped with small fridge, microwave, coffee maker. The furnishings and flooring are a little old but very clean. The room has a balcony and oceanfront view is amazing. Parking is free and easy location. The pool is very nice and offer a nice access to the beach. The staff was friendly and helpful. We had a great time at Days Inn Tropical Seas. For the price, the service, the view and a direct access to the beach we couldn't get a better deal.

Reviews.Title: “The gorgeous view makes up for the average rooms”
Reviews.Author: huskertravelers
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here while visiting relatives. The hotel was very easy to find, in a great central location right on the beach. It is close to shops and dining.We had an ocean front room on the second floor. The room was large and clean. The furnishings are a little dated but ok since the price reflects that. The view and sounds of the ocean from the balcony make up for the modest furnishings. The pool and hot tub area looks recently remodeled and very nice. The staff is friendly Free covered parking is available.The morning sunrise is awesome to watch. We had a great time at Days Inn Tropical Seas.

Reviews.Title: “Hidden Treasue”
Reviews.Author: harddogg2000
Reviews.Content: For the price and access to the beach you cann't go wrong with this hotel. We just got off a wonderful week in Orlando and this was sort of a prelude to that. We spent two days in Daytona at this hotel was a hidden jewel. Clean and the location was great.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Customer Service at a Great Price”
Reviews.Author: Mavet99
Reviews.Content: I spent weeks doing my research for a hotel to stay along Atlantic Avenue. I had never been to FL but, wanted to visit friends in Daytona. I was a little hesistant booking a room at a hotel I had never even seen but, I am glad I stayed here. The staff was amazing and very courteous. I stayed from August 25 - August 28 and wish I could of stayed longer. My oceanfront view was amazing and the hotel was very clean. I was really impressed with the staff. I had a 8pm flight Saturday but, the shuttle would not be picking me up until 4pm. The staff allowed me to leave my luggage from check-out time at 11am until 4pm while, I walked along Atlantic Avenue. I am definitely going to stay here everytime I come to Daytona! The only problem I had was that this hotel is a few miles from the boardwalk and most of the restaurants but, there is a bus stop out front that will take you along Atlantic Ave shops. Across the street from the hotel though is a couple of quaint little eateries though.

Reviews.Title: “Wish I lived here”
Reviews.Author: BreannK
Reviews.Content: Right on the beach! Our room led to the deck that featured a pool and hot tub with steps down to the beach. It's nice to watch the sun rise over the ocean from your room

Reviews.Title: “Days Inn Tropical Seas:A Little Slice Of Heaven On Earth!”
Reviews.Author: Bob127
Reviews.Content: What can I say other than I searched up and down and all around the internet looking for the ideal place to enjoy a 2 week vacation with my family.It was very important to find a great place to stay for this was my sons honeymoon even though they married in October of '09 due to work issues they could not get time off till now.Well I read the reviews of the Tropical Seas Days Inn and after 1 phone call I knew this was the place to be!Let me start by saying the staff is just outstanding from Roger the manager, to the front desk,to the awesome young ladies who clean your rooms and maintenance also.The first thing that stood out was the fact that I was treated like family even though this was my first trip to Days Inn Tropical Seas.Roger was extremely helpful in booking the rooms we desired and gave us rooms with awesome views of the ocean,beach,pool,and fishing pier.Next the overall cleanliness of everything from the front desk area, to the lobby,to the internet area,washing machine area,patio and pool was just great.There was easy access from the pool to the beach.The rooms were spacious,very clean and comfortable and modern to say the least.We had a full kitchen to use and everything worked properly and we enjoyed many a meal in our room.The staff was just outstanding in handling the few questions we had and was very knowledgeable about the Daytona area.All in all the Days Inn Tropical Seas is worth every bit of the time and money you would invest in it!We cant wait to come back next year and hopefully stay longer in our new found paradise!

Reviews.Title: “Two thumbs up”
Reviews.Author: otter1539
Reviews.Content: Me and my husband stayed here for the first time in July of 2010. The view from our balcony was amazing. The staff was friendly and helpful ( Debbie in house keeping, your the best.). It was quiet and in a location that made it easy to cross over to the main land. Like I said, this was our first time but I am sure it will not be our last. The Lay's Cincinnati, OH

Reviews.Title: “Better than I expected”
Reviews.Author: RD423
