Reviews.Content: I went here to get away for a couple days and was very impressed.After countless hours researching where to stay i picked this hotel b/c of the reviews and price (91 a night for oceanfront room).When i got there the staff was very friendly and the manager upgraded my room to a 6th floor oceanfront room with kitchen for no extra charge.Room was very clean had no weird odors and the patio furniture was newer.Pool and hotub we very clean and pool is heated and theres a little heated sprayer to wash off the sand.I was also suprised they have a free shop vac and hose in the parking garage to hose off my car which i really appreciated. The location was great close to shops burger king across the street and you can walk to crabby joes it was a very enjoyable stay and def will go back and stay here bc i trust them. It was over equipped for my needs and still affordable.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel in the past, but unexpected issues this visit”
Reviews.Author: Kiera1976
Reviews.Content: We have stayed in this hotel several times, so when we decided to take a trip with our extended family, we were excited to recommend this hotel as our beach destination. We have always found the rooms to be clean and comfortable and the staff very helpful. This time...it was a bit of a different story. We had reserved three non-smoking rooms ahead of time, but when we arrived (in the early afternoon), the rooms they had available for us were two non-smoking rooms and one smoking room. All the other non-smoking rooms were occupied. This presented a bit of a problem since several family members are allergic to smoke. It required some shifting and problem solving on our part to make the rooms work for our family. When we left our rooms to go to the beach the next morning, we left the DO NOT DISTURB signs on our doors since some family members were leaving valuable items in their rooms and simply did not want anyone to enter our rooms. Imagine our surprise when we returned a couple hours later to find all our personal items on the floor, and our mattresses leaning in the hallway outside our rooms with ALL the doors in the entire hallway WIDE OPEN!! Apparently, they had received a new shipment of mattresses, and were changing out the mattresses in all the guest rooms. We were very concerned that we were not notified this was going to happen, and upset that our rooms were entered, our personal items moved and re-arranged, and our room doors left wide open--especially when we had specifically left signs up requesting that our rooms not be disturbed. The staff and management could not seem to understand our concerns. Overall, this is a hotel that has been clean and a good value in the past, but we were embarrassed we had recommended it for our extended family this trip. Although we may personally give this hotel another try in the future, I would NOT feel comfortable recommending it to a friend or family member again.

Reviews.Title: “For a 2-Star hotel.....this is a great option”
Reviews.Author: jlnjz
Reviews.Content: Excellent option if you're looking for a budget hotel. Is it a "5-star hotel"? Not even close. But for a 2-star it is deserves an excellent rating. I was accompanying a group of teenagers on spring break and the hotel was NOT my choice. I was not thrilled with it but was hopeful after reading the reviews. The only time that we've ever stayed in a hotel of this class is when someone else has booked it and we've had no choice. Having said that, for a budget trip, this is a great option. The furniture, finishes, TV, and overall hotel are very dated but they are clean. We had 2 rooms that connected -- a double with a small kitchen and a king with a microwave and mini-fridge. Would have liked to have been able to watch some movies on demand but no option for that. Bathroom was clean....dated but no mold or anything like that. The kitchen is tiny with no counter space whatsoever but it functioned as a great option for breakfast and lunch. The pool area is actually very nice. Much nicer than the overall hotel. And you can't beat the view of the ocean/beach. The staff was excellent and I overheard several times the staff greeting guests that were returning for this year's vacation. This part of Daytona Beach is pretty dead. Not really any good restaurants within walking distance. BUT, for the price we paid for a spring break trip we were very happy. I booked 2 weeks before coming and was amazed that I was able to get a room on the beach.......any beach.......for around $100 per night. I would recommend this to a friend if they were looking for an option to spend a week at the beach and not have to shell out $500 per night. The pictures online were accurate with the exception that they do make the rooms feel larger than they really are. They aren't too small, just not as large as I thought.

Reviews.Title: “best hotel in Daytona Beach”
Reviews.Author: bradleyemt
Reviews.Content: I had a room that had stove and everything in it and it was very nice. We loved the pool and hottub the pool was heated we had a great time. We did not want to leave on the day we had to check out.

Reviews.Title: “Good choice for us and our needs”
Reviews.Author: Go_GreenBay
Reviews.Content: We just needed a place to sleep for the night and chose this one because of price. On the beach which was awesome. Pool and hot tub where great. Pool was heated so I was able to enjoy it even though the evening air was cool. We would stay here again for even more nights than just the one.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Cherry L
Reviews.Content: We stayed 2 nights and had an Oceanfront room on the 3rd floor. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The room was very clean and roomy. We did have a problem with the air conditioner leaking onto the floor but the problem was taken care of immediately. This hotel did not have a restaurant or breakfast available but we had our own breakfast items and took advantage of the refridgerator and microwave. Restaurants were within walking distance to the hotel. The view of the beach, the accessability to the beach and the hot tub and pool makes this hotel a fantastic place to be. One thing I would suggest to the hotel would be to make available more beach chairs for guests to take onto the beach. The two that were available were always in use.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: gorockets2
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a long weekend attending a wedding in Daytona Beach. We truly enjoyed our stay at Days Inn Tropical Sea. We enjoyed the people watching from our balcony, the location of the hotel and the easy access to the beach. It has a truly friendly staff and has very clean rooms. It's not your "resort" type of place, but your not paying "resort" type of prices. Nice clean pool, hot tub, shuffle board, and corn hole game available on the pool deck. Crabby Joe's, which is located just down the beach on the pier, was one our favorite places to eat. We would stay here again

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel at a great price!”
Reviews.Author: petersen1970
Reviews.Content: This hotel was a great find. We arranged for two connecting rooms, one king with a sleeper couch and a second room with two queen beds and a full service kitchen and refrigerator. The hotel, which was built in the late eighties, had good parking that included an attached underground parking garage. The hotel was small enough so that you never felt overwhelmed and the staff was accommodating and helpful. The rooms were clean. The ocean-view rooms we had had a usable balcony with a great view of the beach. The hotel’s location was just north of a access point, so it is easy to drive your vehicle onto the beach. This part of Daytona Beach was quieter than the central part of Daytona, and the location had several beach amenities that ranged from ice cream to bicycles. We have traveled all over the world, and this is one of the better hotels we have stayed in. In summary it is light on the wallet and right out the back door, past the swimming pool, is a gorgeous beach.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, view, and experience!”
Reviews.Author: Technoman45
Reviews.Content: Room was clean and just right size. Staff was helpful and very friendly. Location was wonderful with Ocean front view. Pool and Jacuzzi clean and nice.

Reviews.Title: “Affordable- Breath Taking Stay # 403”
Reviews.Author: godivaleeflorida
Reviews.Content: We stayed here two nights/3 days. My daughter says it is the best hotel she has been in. We were facing the Atlantic Ocean and the outdoor pool. There is a small and cute kitchen area across from the bathroom. Two double beds and your own private balcony. Hanging our towels/swimsuits on the balcony to dry saved us from using the dryer *_*. Affordable stay at 99.oo a night, plus tax. Good parking, quiet, just a few steps from the ocean and pool. Staff was friendly. Mini-golf across the street/gift shop. Took breezy walks at night. Safe area, lots of family also around. Woke up to the waves hitting the shores this morning, sunrising, and two dolphins swimming nearby.... Will come back again, but now hungry for what other hotels offer as well :)

Reviews.Title: “Location and Budget . . .You decide . . .”
Reviews.Author: Trvlwme
Reviews.Content: We have stayed in this hotel three times in the past on our way to Fort Lauderdale from Asheville. Each time I chose this hotel for price and location. By now I know what I'm getting for my budget dollar, dated clean hotel on the beach. This hotel offers limited services, NO Breakfast, clean, but definitely dated rooms right on a beautiful beach. The sand here is hard packed with cars allowed to drive on it, and walking out into the ocean, there is NO drop off just a gradual slow drop. We stayed this time with family including our two grandkids. I asked for and got a room on a high floor to limit the noise from other guests. There was a family reunion in the hotel with many kids and they were a bit noisey on the lower floors. The view from all the rooms is wonderful, the pool is clean and the hot tub, in this case was not working, but was open and clean. The cord to run the jets was broken. I asked Eddie at the front desk for a dinner suggestion and he suggested "Our Deck, Down Under" less than a mile away, but not walking distance. It is a local seafood place, very popular and for good reason. The food was good, large portions and reasonably priced. It was located on the inner coastal, so it had a water view as well. Eddie is very helpful and always seems friendly to me. I will continue to stay at the Days Inn, again fully knowing that for a budget price, I'm getting what I paid for. There is a Bob Evans restaurant on your way back out to I-95, about 10 minutes away for breakfast or a good comfort food dinner . . . .There is also a miniture golf course across the street from this hotel if you need to amuse the kids . . .

Reviews.Title: “Fine hotel, recommended”
Reviews.Author: DutchDerk
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel on a very wet and windy day in May 2009. Lady at the reception was friendly, we got room 304, oceanfront, beautiful view.. Liked it, was spotless clean and everything was there.. Prize good too.. Internet access at the lobby was a plus.. Parking was high from the road, so no flooding..

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stay”
Reviews.Author: teachrsue
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 3 nights at the Tropical Seas Days Inn in Daytona Beach Shores. The AAA rate was 71.00 a night for an oceanfront room with a full kitchen and two double beds. Parking is located in the lot in front of the hotel or there is a parking garage located underground. Parking was easy and free. The hotel has mostly oceanfront rooms and a few on the north and south sides of the building which are oceanview. The room we had was on the 2nd floor which is at lobby level. The room was very clean and only the signs of typical beach type wear on the furnishings. The bath was a bit small, however the water pressure and lighting in the bath were fine. The room had a small kitchen with a full size refridgerator, microwave, small 4 burner stove with oven. The fridge was great with keeping everything cold when we loaded it with drinks. The beds were a bit soft for our liking, but the sheets and pillows were nice. There was a small table with two chairs and plenty of lighting throughout the room. The sliding glass door opened to our oceanfront balcony. The balcony was private, contained two chairs and a small table. The pool deck was huge with plenty of lounge chairs, tables with chairs and umbrellas. The pool is quite small for the size of the pool deck. The pool was very warm, nice for cooler days, I hope it cools off for summer! There is also a small hot tub. The pool itselt gets shade from the building in the afternoons, there is an area that is not blocking the sun for afternoon sunbathers. The beach is only steps away from the pool deck and there is a hose to spray off unwanted sand. They provide limited beach chairs to take to the beach. There is also a beach vender selling food and renting umbrellas, lounge chairs, boogie boards etc, located very close to the hotel's beach access. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this hotel for a no frills get away or family vacation. The staff was extremely pleasant and helpful from the front desk to the housekeeping. It would be even better if the hotel replaced the mattresses and updated to duvets that many hotels now have. Also provide a few more items for the kitchen such as ice trays, a pitcher and some plastic tumblers for larger drinks. Finally the location is in Daytona Beach Shores near the Port Orange bridge. There are places to eat, shopping and grocery stores close by. We enjoyed our stay and would stay at the Tropical Seas Days Inn again!

Reviews.Title: “Paradise found!”
Reviews.Author: nancyhiggins
Reviews.Content: My family and I just got back from a weeks stay at the Tropical Seas.This is the best hotel in Daytona Beach for the money.The staff go above and beyond to make you feel comfortable and assure you enjoy your stay.They have old fashioned hospitality,which is something that is very hard to find now a days.The room is clean and has everything you need .It is on the quieter side of Daytona Beach and is absolutely gorgeous there.You can walk to restaruants,and shops.The view of the ocean from the private balcony is awesome.I enjoyed my coffee every morning just watching the sun rise.The pool is nice and warm and the hot tub is just delightful.If you are going to Daytona Beach and want to stay at an excellent hotel, you can't beat this one.Wish I was there right now..but I will be back again.Can't wait!

Reviews.Title: “Not as I had hoped...”
Reviews.Author: BethyB
Reviews.Content: I've read the reviews and felt like I made the best choice for my BUDGET. The first thing we noticed as we made our way down the dimly lit corridor was the smell...a little musty combined with faint cigarette smoke which us non-smokers have a nose for. The room decor was a little dated with old, dusty lamp shades. I'm sure the dark carpets held a multitude of sins and odors. Bathroom needed a spruce up. Housekeeping consisted of making beds (as though someone rolled in them immediately afterward), and a change of towels. The best thing about Tropical Seas was the balcony and pool area. In all, the rate and location was 'very good' for beach front. Rooms were 'average'--though could have been better. Hotel staff were cordial.

Reviews.Title: “great hotel”
Reviews.Author: dowopjoeOhio
Reviews.Content: The Tropical Seas Is the best value on the beach.great location close to Sun Glow pier. Our room had a private balcony,micro.fridge,and very good beds. Front desk staff was always very helpfull,and the warmest pool in Daytona. For the price it can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: “Stay for the view”
Reviews.Author: ExtraPickles
Reviews.Content: The hotel is right on the beach -- amazing views of the ocean day and night. The unit has a private balcony so that you can dry out your bathing suits in relative seclusion. The room was quite spacious for three people. The in-unit large fridge and microwave made meals easy -- which was a good thing considering the hotel does not offer any meals. Our bathroom was in need of repair. The bath fixtures were off their bases. We didn't experience any housekeeping since we enjoyed our view and breakfast until 1 p.m. Evidently housekeeping ends its run at 12 noon, or so we were told when we returned to our room at the end of the day. The pool was warm, but had a good deal of debris on the surface and the floor in the shallow section. While the Internet was free, the connection in the room, business center, and front desk was extremely slow. Our room's connection reminded me of my old dial-up days; don't plan on watching any streaming video. Our best service was Joe the porter. He worked hard to make sure that we were happy. Days Inn is an excellent value, especially if you are not expecting a three-star hotel.

Reviews.Title: “our days in daytona”
Reviews.Author: dalton03
Reviews.Content: we traveled twelve hours to get to this hotel and it was a welcome sight. this is not our first stay there and will not be our last . its affordable and clean and comfortable . we always get a room overlooking the beach. the beach and pool were awesome. and its a wyndham rewards hotel as well. thank u days inn trpical seas of daytona. the wales- lyvers clan from ky. go dale jr.

Reviews.Title: “Not a bad deal”
Reviews.Author: Pooh27361
Reviews.Content: First, you have to remember this is not a Hilton and it's on the beach. Hotels on the beach take a lot of wear and tear from the salty ocean breezes. This Days Inn was well maintained. They keep the facility clean and neat. We had an Ocean View room and we did have a nice view of the ocean from our balcony. Our room was equipped with a microwave and mini fridge and that is always nice. There was free internet access. We had some early troubles with our reservation but after a change in management, the problems were quickly taken care of. If you are wanting a hotel at a reasonable rate, on the beach, that has a decent upkeep; this is the place for you. This hotel is away from the hustle and bustle of the main area of Daytona Beach but it served us well.

Reviews.Title: “was clean and had a great location”
Reviews.Author: sandersfield
Reviews.Content: we thought everything about this hotel was top notch for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place, Good Price”
Reviews.Author: starbucksman
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here four times. I enjoy walking and running on the beach and use it for daytrips to Orlando and the Speedway.Clean rooms, nice kitchen, friendly staff. Walk right onto the beach. Rates are reasonable. Can walk to plenty of moderately priced restaurants and Publix store. A relaxing few days each time I have stayed here during winter, summer or fall.

Reviews.Title: “Very Hospitable at the Days Inn Tropical Seas”
Reviews.Author: beachlover056
Reviews.Content: The Days Inn Tropical Seas is a great place to stay. It is kid friendly and the staff is very helpful and courtious! It is the perfect hotel for the beach lover with easy access to it. The room was very clean which is very important with small children and at the end of the day you can sit on the balcony with a great view of the sunset.

Reviews.Title: “worst service and terrible attitude”
Reviews.Author: medoathedo
Reviews.Content: We stopped by and made a reservation for 6 rooms at this hotel. The desk clerk called the manager to the front and he made us a good deal on the room. We thought after the first day we would not get service, after days 2,3,4,5 we figured something was wrong. It turns out they change sheets only if you want them to and if you are not in the room, they only leave towels sometimes.I was told by that we are supposed to receive service each and every day. I complained about this and there was a women at the desk with the desk clerk as I left the desk I overheard her say :too bad, we want to leave early and will do it when we want. We all decided to check out the next day but had planned on staying at least 3 more days. We were speaking to some guests on the pool deck who had the same experience. My brother was in 103 and listened to the girls complain all day. I suggest a new cleaning staff. I do think you have a nice staff, Jo did a great job showing the rooms and the manager made us a great deal but after that, forget it. We spoke with Patrick the manager and he apologized for it and promised he would look into it but I am sure that if each one of my 6 rooms had this experience than this must be the way they want it..

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Days Inn Tropicial Seas”
Reviews.Author: NickHolmdel_NJ
Reviews.Content: My family first stayed here 15 years ago and loved the place. We came back several times since then and recommend this place for singles and families. The Days Inn is CLEAN, SERVICE is EXCELLENT, the POOL is CLEAR, the LOCATION is WALKING distance to everything you might need and the STAFF is VERY FRIENDLY and HELPFUL. Nick

Reviews.Title: “Love the place!”
Reviews.Author: lbh3
Reviews.Content: We chose Days Inn Daytona South Beach again for our summer holiday 2008. This is our 5 stay at the hotel, and we have enjoyed it every time. Oceanfront room, pool and close to shopping is important to us. This hotel have everything.

Reviews.Title: “good for the money”
Reviews.Author: grapefarmer
Reviews.Content: We stayed here 2 nights prior to going to Amelia Island. I used to have family in the area and so was familiar with the location. For the price it's a pretty good deal. You're right on the ocean; we had an oceanfront corner room and it was great to just sit on the balcony and watch the water and people. Place is definitely older, but you're not paying top dollar either. Accomodations were fine, place was clean and people were nice. One thing to watch; we booked online through days inn and they had a prepay special where you rec'd a discount. Well we prepaid on the credit card, and then they billed us again after we got home. So keep an eye out! I'd recommend it though.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: RickG3
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a family vacation in Daytona Beach. This is the 2nd time we have stayed with Days Inn. Not only is it a great value, the staff was very helpful and frindly. The hotel is a lttle old but they keep the rooms updated and clean as well as all the grounds. A great location and a great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “NICE....FOR 1 DAY”
Reviews.Author: doughboy21
Reviews.Content: The lady at the desk was RUDE at check in, and didn't really want to help us..The elevator was noisy. We stayed on the 5th floor,the hallway was dark and old looking....suposed to be no smoking,but there were ash trays by elevators. (gross) .The room was small,real real small for a double (ocean view). the view was nice of the ocean . the balconey was nice too. The beach was GREAT.

Reviews.Title: “Hidden Jewel”
Reviews.Author: KmjChoi
Reviews.Content: We used to stay at this hotel for many years but have not been for a while. I had a short stay this June and found it hard to believe that it was better than ever. The management and staff have always been top of the line, but now they have added a superior product to go along with the service. I have booked rooms with Patrick for two additional stays in July and September for groups and want to let everyone know that this place is the best. There is one of the cleanest pool areas and hot tubs you will ever see, and the idea to place a glass fence area instead of railing is so appealing. The oceanfront rooms have both microwave and refrigerators and some even contain full kitchens. Each has its own private balcony. I guarantee that you will enjoy your say at this Days Inn and ask for Patrick. He will get you a price you can afford even in this tough economy. Thanks again Days Inn, keep up the great work and I will see you all soon.

Reviews.Title: “It's all about the view”
Reviews.Author: Lisalouuu
Reviews.Content: We arrived at the motel at 7am after driving for 18 hours and the room we booked was not available so the staff graciously upgraded us to a kitchenette so we could check in and get some sleep. We were able to enjoy a whole day at the ocean because of the free upgrade. I love this hotel! Right on the ocean, free coffee all day and the view is priceless. The hotel is not a 5*but the price is great for an oceanfront room. We stayed on the fourth floor and the view is wonderful. Kids had fun in the pool and made friends quickly. A good motel priced right for families traveling on a budget.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the ocean front”
Reviews.Author: mhardy01
Reviews.Content: I rented a room at this hotel for my stay in Daytona Beach. The hotel is very nice. Extremely attentive staff starting with the manager and continuing with the rest of the staff. This is a four story hotel located at the start of the beach stip. The hotel is very clean and I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay for the money & the beach is fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: NatalieEllen
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the South Tropical Seas when we were in Florida for the 2008 Daytona 500. The hotel was clean & the staff was friendly & helpful. The ocean view from the room is amazing & the pool area is very nice & kept very tidy. We had some problems with our heater/air conditioning unit that didn't work properly, it was replaced but unfortunately the replacement did not work either. The staff was friendly & helpful both times. The sound from other units opening their sliding glass doors is very loud & the hotel is probably due for some new doors to eliminate this problem. All in all we enjoyed our stay here & would recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to enjoy the beautiful beach at Daytona for a reasonable cost.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome”
Reviews.Author: zippyland
Reviews.Content: This is absolutely the best Days Inn I have ever visited. The staff were super friendly, the room was great and the pool and hot tub were awesome (it was December when we were there, but the pool was soooo warm that we were swimming in it at 10 pm). And the view!!!! The room had a wonderful view of the ocean. We booked the hotel from the Days Inn website and paid something like $62 for an oceanfront room. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel”
Reviews.Author: piscesangel
Reviews.Content: I was little leary at first, but this turned out to be a nice hotel. Friendly, helpful staff. We were first put into a bottom floor room as requested, but when we opened our curtains we realized our view of the ocean was obstructed by the pool patio, etc. Soo...we went to the front desk and were moved immediately to the 3rd floor which had a perfect view! The room was nice, clean, had a refrigerator and microwave, and table to sit at. So, overall a nice stay. Only wish they served a continental breakfast! We will definitely go back though.

Reviews.Title: “A nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: jamie772003
Reviews.Content: The hotel was nice and smaller. The part of the beach it was on was excellent and very quiet. The staff was very friendly. The hotel was pretty clean as well. I would only recommend staying at this hotel if you have a car while down there. We did not and the hotel is kind of far away from the main part of the beach where all the restaurants and fun things to do are. We had to take taxis and buses which added up. Other than that I would definitely recommend this hotel.

HotelInfo.Name: Days Inn Tropical Seas
HotelInfo.Address: 3357 South Atlantic Avenue, Daytona Beach, FL 32118
